wikipedia_page.main: Gary Slater, (born 15 May 1961), is a British sports journalist, who has worked for The Daily Telegraph and The Times. As a Warrington Wolves historian he has written several books for the popular rugby league football club.  In 2014 he was the ghostwriter for an autobiography of Mike Nicholas, a former rugby league footballer.

response: *Gary Slater (born 1961 in Warrington), sports journalist,Warrington Guardian 28 April 2012  retrieved December 2017 currently working for the Daily Telegraph
